document_data.name: Temple of Eilish
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Eilish''' was one of the last surviving structures in [[Pazar]], a city in [[Raurin]]. The [[efreet]] [[Khalitharius]] was imprisoned there beneath the [[Star of Aga-Pelar]].{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|39}}
document_data.History:
After binding Khalitharius in a lead box around the year {{yearlink|350}}, [[Martek]] had it taken to the Temple of Eilish, where it would be kept.

In {{yearlink|1356}}, adventurers sent by [[Aman Al-Raqib]] retrieved the Star of Aga-Pelar, releasing Khalitharius in the process.
